display_information.name: Anonymous Q and A Bot
display_information.description: Post questions and collect anonymous responses with voting. Perfect for gathering honest feedback, team surveys, and anonymous Q&A sessions.
display_information.long_description:
Anonymous Q and A Bot enables teams to ask questions and receive anonymous responses with a built-in voting system. Users can post questions to any channel, and team members can respond anonymously through a simple button click. All responses appear in threads with upvote/downvote reactions, and the app automatically tracks and displays point totals. Question posters can close voting to announce the winning response. Perfect for:

• Gathering honest feedback without attribution
• Team surveys and polls
• Anonymous Q&A sessions
• Decision-making with community input
• Retrospectives and team discussions

All responses are completely anonymous - the original responder is never identified. The app supports multiple workspaces and stores all data securely in an encrypted database.
